links.title: Bosch CEO says diesel technology remains crucial to meeting climate goals
links.description: Volkmar Denner, the head of the world's biggest automotive supplier, Bosch, argues that diesel technology remains crucial - to meet emissions targets and give carmakers the time they need to shift to e-mobility. A rift has emerged in German automaking over the future of diesel technology.

links.title: Chanos Lays Out Bearish Thesis on Tesla
links.description: James Chanos, the short seller who runs hedge fund Kynikos Associates, launched into a soliloquy on recent frenzied stock moves in the likes of Tesla Motors and Netflix He caveated these comments at the Heard on the Street conference with the warning that any stock he mentions, the audience should assume he's short.

links.title: Tesla is about to break out to new highs, according to this chart. Here's how to trade it
links.description: Tesla recently climbed out of bear market territory, and one chart-minded trader sees an even bigger comeback in the cards. Shares of the electric auto maker surged 7 percent this week after Pepsi announced it preordered 100 of the new Tesla Semi trucks.

message.body: $TSLA The SEC is investigating Tesla over how it's selling its Model 3, and the company won't talk about it. https://stocknews.com/news/tsla-tesla-inc-tsla-refuses-to-disclose-details-of-sec-investigation/

links.title: Tesla Inc (TSLA) Refuses To Disclose Details Of SEC Investigation
links.description: Regulators have looked into whether Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) is being honest about its Model 3 production and delivery process, and neither side is talking. The Detroit News has more details on the interesting development: The Securities and Exchange Commission investigated Tesla over how it was selling its Model 3 sedan, but the company didn't tell investors about it, and may still be under federal investigation, according to a new report.

links.title: Second-ranking Senate Republican expects tax bill to pass Tuesday
links.description: John Cornyn, the No. 2 U.S. Senate Republican, said on Sunday he was confident Republicans would pass a tax overhaul bill this week. "I am confident we will pass this bill, probably on Tuesday," Cornyn said in a television interview on ABC's "This Week."
